Backstory.title: In a World Of Soft Cuddles
Backstory.subtitle: Backstory
Backstory.desc: Introducing the adorably unique meme coin! While other coins like Doge and Shiba flood the market with billions of tokens annually, Teddy Bear Inu stands out with genuine scarcity.

overview.title: Overview
overview.desc: <name>Teddy Bear Inu</name> offers the best of both worlds: the fun of a cute meme coin and the value of an ultra-scarce crypto asset. Every new holder and buyer of the limited supply contributes to pushing <symbol>$TBI</symbol> price upwards, following simple supply/demand economics, offering TBI holders the potential for significant profits.

feature.title: Key Features
feature.item2: <highlight>ZERO buy/sell</highlight> taxes for price pump potential

Guide.title: Guide
Guide.subtitle: Step by Step
Guide.item1:
Download MetaMask or your preferred wallet from google play or App Store.

Alternatively, you can visit metamask.io to get the Google chrome extension for desktop users.
Guide.item2: Visit the <link>pulsechain.com</link> website. Click the ‘add Pulsechain to MetaMask’ button on their homepage. Click ‘Confirm’ on your MetaMask wallet to add the Pulsechain network.
Guide.item3: If you need to bridge ERC20 tokens into $PLS you can bridge using <link>portalXswap.io</link> and bridge in from networks such as Ethereum, BSC, Avax, Solana, Polygon and much more. Once bridged you can swap $PLS for $TBI using <link>piteas.io</link>

Team.title: The Team
Team.subtitle: Spotlight
Team.para1: <bold>Our objective:</bold> To showcase to the broader crypto community the viability and vibrancy of contributing to this thrilling ecosystem. We aim to foster an environment where creativity thrives, self-expression flourishes, and inclusivity reigns supreme. Behind the scenes, our efforts are dedicated to fortifying the foundation. We bolster resilience, infuse liquidity into the ecosystem daily, and forge alliances with fellow community-driven projects, fostering opportunities for all.
Team.para2: <bold>Teddy Bear INU</bold> isn't just a token; it's your companion in this journey. Everyone deserves a reliable ally. Let's embark on this adventure together!

Dapps.subtitle: Get in touch with TeddyBear INU

phase1.title: Research & Planning
phase1.item1: Clearly define TBI's unique value prop focused on the memecoin theme
phase1.item3: Assemble top-tier development team with memecoin experience
phase1.item4: Produce detailed technical whitepaper outlining TBI's architecture

phase2.title: Testing
phase2.item2: Rigorous testing, bug bounties, testnet simulations completed

phase3.title: Launch & Ecosystem Growth
phase3.item1: Major marketing push engaging top crypto/meme influencers
phase3.item2: Establish partnerships with leading brands in the private sector

phase4.title: Adoption & Community Governance
phase4.item1: Achieve 100,000+ active community members across all channels
phase4.item5: TBI merchant integration with major e-commerce retailers
phase4.item6: Launch initial TBI ecosystem dApps - NFTs, merch store, games
phase4.item7: Implement full community governance and proposals system
